</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As of December&#160;31, 2012, the Company's shares were listed on the Norwegian OTC list. On January 29, 2014, the Company completed its initial public offering in the United States. The total number of shares issued by the Company as of December&#160;31, 2013 consisted of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;shares issued upon formation of the Company,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	50,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;shares issued to the general public in a private placement during February 2011,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	150,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;shares issued to Seadrill as part of the consideration for the transfer of the business to the Company on March 31, 2011,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	30,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	issued in a private placement during March 2012 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	13,513,514
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	shares issued when North Atlantic Drilling completed its initial public offering on the New York Stock Exchange on January 29, 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	After incorporation, the Company repurchased shares that may be canceled or held as treasury shares. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and the Company held
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	237,386
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;common shares as treasury shares at cost (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2,373,863
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;treasury shares).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s shareholders passed a resolution at the annual general meeting held on September&#160;21, 2012, authorizing the reduction of the Company&#8217;s share premium account from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$834.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and an increase in the Company&#8217;s contributed surplus account of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$834.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, with immediate effect, the purpose of which was primarily to increase the ability of the Company to declare and distribute dividends to its shareholders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s contributed deficit account originally amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2,000.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and relates to the difference between the carrying value of net assets purchased and the consideration paid for the businesses acquired in the North Atlantic Restructuring. This account will not be netted against future earnings and does not restrict the Company&#8217;s ability to pay dividends. Following the recognition of certain common control transactions in 2011, 2012, and 2013, the contributed deficit has been reduced to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$10.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Reverse stock split and capital reduction
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In December 2015 the shareholders in a special general meeting approved a capital reorganization including a 1-for-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;reverse stock split of the Company's issued and outstanding common shares and reducing par value from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. In addition the total authorized share capital was reduced from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2,000.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$10.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	As a result of the capital restructuring the number of shares outstanding has fallen from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	241,142,651
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	24,114,232
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As a result, the issued share capital of the Company has fallen from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1,205.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, and the contributed surplus has been increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1,203.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	F-28
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

	)

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

	&#160;

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

	(58.6
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For the actuarial loss related to pension, the accumulated applicable amount of income taxes related to companies domiciled in Norway, where the tax rate is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$7.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December 31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	: tax rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	27%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, deferred tax asset of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$21.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="NADL20F2015_HTM_S74DBE9317AF958C28DB815270F227595">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Note 19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;&#8211; Share based compensation
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Share Option Plan
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Board resolved, in its meeting on February 14, 2011, to establish a share option based incentive scheme for the Company&#8217;s employees and directors, approved a set of rules applicable to the scheme and reserved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of its authorized, but unissued share for use to satisfy future exercises of options granted under the scheme.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Further, the Board resolved that options granted prior to the listing of the Company&#8217;s shares could be granted at an exercise price equal to the subscription price in the private placement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;options have been granted under the scheme in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. However, the Company did recognize a charge for share options granted at the Seadrill Ltd level related to North Atlantic employees of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In December 2015 the shareholders of NADL in a special general meeting approved a capital reorganization including a 1-for-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;reverse stock split of the Company's issued and outstanding common shares and reducing par value from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As a result of the capital restructuring the number of authorized, but unissued, share options has been adjusted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	600,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Restricted Stock Units
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	On November 7, 2013, the Board of the Company&#160;approved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	278,778
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;awards under North Atlantic Drilling`s Restricted Stock Units (&#8220;RSU&#8221;) plan.&#160; During 2015, the Board of the Company&#160;approved a further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1,587,719
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;awards under North Atlantic Drilling`s Restricted Stock Units (&#8220;RSU&#8221;) plan.&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Under the terms of the plan, the holder of an award is entitled to receive a share in the respective company if still employed at the end of the three year vesting period.&#160; There is no requirement for the holder to pay for the share on grant date or upon vesting of the award.&#160; In addition the holder is entitled to receive an amount equal to the ordinary dividends declared and paid on the Company's shares during the vesting period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In December 2015 the shareholders of NADL in a special general meeting approved a capital reorganization including a 1-for-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;reverse stock split of the Company's issued and outstanding common shares and reducing par value from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As a result of the capital restructuring the number of RSUs has been adjusted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1,571,251
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;units.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The fair value of the awards are calculated based on the market share price on grant date which was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	US$9.46
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	for the RSUs issued in 2013,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	US$1.33
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	for the RSUs granted in April 2015 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	US$0.37
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#E8E8E8;">
	for the RSUs granted in December 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The fair value of the awards expected to vest is recognized as compensation cost straight-line over the vesting period.&#160; All awards are currently expected to vest. Compensation cost related to the RSU plans of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;has been recognized in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;respectively of unrecognized compensation costs related to non-vested awards.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<A NAME="eolPage101"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	* Adjustment relates to the Company's 1 for 10 reverse stock split completed in December 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="NADL20F2015_HTM_S4C0E4FFEBA1654038AC4E13D33E6DBB2">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Note 20 - Pension benefits
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Defined benefit plans
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Company has several defined benefit pension plans covering substantially all Norwegian employees. All off the plans are administered by a life insurance company. Under these plans, the Company contributes to the employee&#8217;s pension plan amounts ranging between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;percent of the employee&#8217;s annual salary.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	For onshore employees in Norway, continuing with the defined benefits plan, the primary benefits are retirement pension of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	66%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of salary at retirement age of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	67
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;years, together with a long-term disability pension. The retirement pension per employee is capped at an annual payment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	66%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of the total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;times the Norwegian Social Security Base. Most employees in this group may choose to retire at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	62
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;years of age on a pre-retirement pension. Offshore employees in Norway have retirement and long-term disability pension of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	60%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of salary at retirement age of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	67
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Offshore employees on mobile units may choose to retire at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	60
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;years of age on a pre-retirement pension.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Annual pension cost
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The expenses for our defined benefit pension plans for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;were as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The accumulated benefit obligation for all defined benefit pension plans was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$101.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$146.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Pension obligations are actuarially determined and are critically affected by the assumptions used, including the expected return on plan assets, discount rates, compensation increases and employee turnover rates. The Company periodically reviews the assumptions used, and adjusts them and the recorded liabilities as necessary.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	During the year a number of employees left the Company and as a result the defined benefit scheme transferred the pension liability for these employees to the life insurance company administering the scheme. The difference between the reduction in benefit obligation and the plan assets transferred to the life insurance company has been recognized within "Other comprehensive income". The settlement is not deemed to be significant in the context of the overall scheme and as such net unrecognized actuarial losses have not been recycled as a result of the settlement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The expected rate of return on plan assets and the discount rate applied to projected benefits are particularly important factors in calculating the Company's pension expense and liabilities. The Company evaluates assumptions regarding the estimated rate of return on plan assets based on historical experience and future expectations on investment returns, which are calculated utilizing the asset allocation classes held by the plan's portfolios. The discount rate is based on the covered bond rate in Norway. Changes in these and other assumptions used in the actuarial computations could impact the projected benefit obligations, pension liabilities, pension expense and other comprehensive income.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The investment policies and strategies for the pension benefit plan funds do not use target allocations for the individual asset categories. The investment objectives are to maximize returns subject to specific risk management policies. The Company diversifies its allocation of plan assets by investing in both domestic and international fixed income securities and domestic and international equity securities. These investments are readily marketable and can be sold to fund benefit payment obligations as they become payable. The estimated yearly return on pension assets was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3.2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Cash flows - Contributions expected to be paid
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The table below shows the Company's expected annual pension plan contributions under defined benefit plans for the years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The expected payments are based on the assumptions used to measure the Company's obligations at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and include estimated future employee services.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	Defined contribution plans

	In addition, the Company has defined contribution plans for all new onshore employees. Total payments to this plan were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;million for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Company has entered into the following significant agreements with related parties:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Transactions with Seadrill
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	$500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;7.75% Bond
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In April 2011 the Company issued a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;bond with a fixed coupon rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	7.75%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum, payable semi-annually in arrears. Seadrill was the holder of the entire bonds. The bond was repaid on January 31, 2014, including a settlement premium of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$22.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, which was settled in cash.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	$600 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;6.25% Senior Unsecured Notes due 2019
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In January 2014 the Company issued a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$600 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Senior Unsecured Notes with a fixed coupon of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	6.25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum, and maturity in January 2019. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Seadrill was the holder of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	31.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of the notes, which amounts to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$186.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	31.1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$186.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	). Interest due to Seadrill for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$11.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$8.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	F-32

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	$85 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;Seadrill Revolving Credit Facility
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Seadrill provided the Company an unsecured revolving credit facility of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;in March 2012.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The facility was increased from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$335 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;on June 28, 2013, and then decreased to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$85 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;on November 20, 2013. The terms of the remaining facility of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$85 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;are the same as stated in the original agreement dated March 30, 2012.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Aggregate draw downs and repayments on this facility during the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, respectively. The interest of the facility was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Libor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.00%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Interest and commitment fee charged relating to the shareholder loan from Seadrill for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#32;amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$1.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;This credit facility matured on January 30, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	1,500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;Senior Unsecured Bond
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	On October 30, 2013, the Company issued a NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	1,500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Senior Unsecured Bond with maturity date October 2018. The bond bears interest at 3-months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	NIBOR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4.40%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The net proceeds were used to repay the remaining outstanding amount under our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$85 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Seadrill Revolving Credit Facility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;During fourth quarter of 2014, Seadrill purchased in the open market an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;ownership in the NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1,500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Senior Unsecured Bond equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$11 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. As at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, Seadrill is the holder of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of the bond, which amounts to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$11.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	). Interest due to Seadrill for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$0.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Financial covenants and debt guarantees
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In February 2015, the Company received approval from its Norwegian Bondholders to amend the Bond Agreement for its NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	1,500 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Norwegian Bond maturing in 2018. Under the terms of the agreement, Seadrill will provide a guarantee for the Bond Issue in exchange for amendments to the covenant package, principally replacing the current financial covenants with the financial covenants within Seadrill's NOK bonds. Additionally, the Company received approval to amend its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$2,000 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;credit facility and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$475 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;secured term loan and revolving credit facility. Under the terms of the agreements, Seadrill provides a guarantee for the credit facilities in exchange for amendments to the covenant package, principally replacing the Company's existing financial covenants with financial covenants within Seadrill's secured credit facilities. This amendment to the covenants was applicable to the period ended December 31, 2014. As such there are no longer separate financial covenants contained within the Company's credit facilities or bond agreements. The guarantee fees charged by Seadrill is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	0.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum of the outstanding principal. The total guarantee fee for the year months ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	). These fees are presented with "other financial items" in the statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Performance guarantees
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Seadrill provides performance guarantees in connection with the Company&#8217;s drilling contracts, and charges the Company an annual fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;of the guaranteed amount to provide these guarantees. The total amount of such guarantees was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$250 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The incurred fee was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;or the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;respectively. In addition, the Company has agreed to reimburse Seadrill for all claims made against Seadrill under the performance guarantees. These fees are presented with "other financial items" in the statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Operation and Management of the West Hercules
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The West Hercules, a harsh environment, semi-submersible drilling rig, is owned by a wholly-owned subsidiary of Ship Finance, a related party, and is controlled by Seadrill through a bareboat charter agreement that expires in 2023. Until October 31, 2013, the company operated and managed this rig pursuant to an operational bareboat charter agreement that the Company entered into with Seadrill in July 2012. Subsequently the company entered into a management agreement with Seadrill which replaced the bareboat charter agreement effective from November 1, 2013, pursuant to which the Company operated and managed the West Hercules when it was employed under the drilling contract with Statoil.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The key terms of the agreement were:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-TOP:4PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:65PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;PADDING-LEFT:32PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Seadrill is obligated to pay North Atlantic a daily management fee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:65PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	under the Drilling Contract which are payable by the client.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Under the management agreement, North Atlantic Drilling has charged Seadrill a management fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$7.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and crew costs of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$37.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#FF0090;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. In August 2014, the operation and management of the West Hercules was transferred to Seadrill.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Management services
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	North Atlantic Management provides all day-to-day management functions to the Company and its subsidiaries in accordance with the terms of the General Management Agreement. North Atlantic Management has contracted in senior management services from Seadrill Management in accordance with the terms of the Management and Administrative Services Agreement. The agreement can be terminated by either party at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	ninety days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;notice. In consideration of the services provided, the Company pay Seadrill a fee that includes the operating costs attributable to the Company plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Seadrill Management had charged North Atlantic Management a fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$25.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$27.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$32.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;for providing the services under the Services Agreement for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Newbuild construction services
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	The Company has contracted a subsidiary of Seadrill to provide construction and project management services for construction of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	West Rigel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;drilling unit. In consideration of the services provided Seadrill has charged the Company a fee that includes the operating costs attributable to the Company plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The total amount charged was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$12.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$9.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$3.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

</FONT>

	2013
</FONT>

	Management services

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Transactions with Ship Finance
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Sale and leaseback agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	In June 2013, the Company entered into sale and leaseback agreement with Ship Finance for the newbuilding jack-up rig, the West Linus for total consideration of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$600 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Upon the closing of the agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$195 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;was paid to North Atlantic Drilling and the remaining balance of the purchase price was paid to North Atlantic Drilling upon the delivery of the rig. The West Linus is chartered back to North Atlantic Drilling on a bareboat charter for a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	15 years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, pursuant to which North Atlantic has been granted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;purchase options. Ship Finance has an option to sell the rig back to North Atlantic Drilling at the end of the charter period. The West Linus was delivered from the yard in February 2014. At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, the West Linus is reported under Drilling Units in the Company&#8217;s balance sheet. Additional disclosure about the VIE has been provided in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Note 24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Seadrill provided a guarantee in the principal amount of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$525 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;issued in favor of Ship Finance, which was payable in the event that the West Linus was not unconditionally accepted by the charterer by June 30, 2014. The guarantee provided by Seadrill commenced on February 13, 2014 and expired in May 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Related Party Loan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;Facility
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Ship Finance granted the VIE company, SFL Linus Ltd., an unsecured loan of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$195 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;on June&#160;28, 2013 to be repaid at the earlier of June 30, 2029 or date of sale of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	West Linus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	rig. While the loan did not initially bear interest, Ship Finance reserved the right to charge interest after the rig is delivered from the shipyard. SFL Linus repaid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$70 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;during the first quarter in 2014 and the outstanding balance at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;is $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	125 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$125.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	). Commencing in February 2014, the loan bore interest of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum. The proceeds of this loan were used to finance the acquisition of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	West Linus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The loan was presented as long term debt to related party on our balance sheet on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. Interest charged by Ship Finance for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$5.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$4.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	$475 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	&#32;Secured Credit Facility
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	On October 17, 2013, SFL Linus Ltd. entered into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$475 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;secured term loan and revolving credit facility with a syndicate of banks to fund the acquisition of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	West Linus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, which was pledged as security thereunder. The facility bears interest at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	LIBOR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;plus a margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2.75%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	is repayable over a term of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	. The outstanding balance at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$354.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$451.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	). In February 2015, North Atlantic Drilling received approval to amend its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$475 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;Credit Facility. Under the terms of the agreement, Seadrill provides a guarantee for the facility in exchange for amendments to the covenant package, principally replacing the Company's financial covenants with financial covenants within Seadrill's secured credit facilities. The guarantee fee charged by Seadrill is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	0.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;per annum of the outstanding principal.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Transactions with Archer
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Engineering Services
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	We receive certain technical engineering services from subsidiaries of Archer Ltd. The charged amount was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$1.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$1.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	$4.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, respectively. These amounts are included in vessel and rig operating expenses. Archer Ltd. is a company in which Seadrill is a large shareholder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:4PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">

	Total long term debt to related party
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;BORDER-TOP:1PX SOLID #000000;">
